intro: Bonania elliptica var. elliptica, commonly known as the elliptic bonania, is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Africa, particularly the Democratic Republic of the Congo. The plant is characterized by its elliptical, glossy leaves and clusters of small, white flowers. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in rainforests. The fruit is a small, three-lobed capsule that contains several seeds.
